message:
Bugfix/version (#151)

* Added back version testing, added versionName back to gradle file, added additional logic/route for receiving versioning values from build server, and fixed gradle task (previously inaccessible from gradle menu)

* Fixed ktlintKotlinScriptCheck error

* Forgot to fix variable name, swap active to previous implementation.

* Add comment for local testing

* Redundant toString call removed

* Revert continuousIntegration task logic (this did work before, I was just doing it wrong)

* Made bottom bar stateless and hoisted version / fingerprint to MainScreen (a revert to getting version name and fingerprint from MainViewModel)

* Update regex to include numbers

author Kurt Burroughs <95700875+KBurroughs@users.noreply.github.com> 1673460380 -0500
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1673460380 -0500

Bugfix/version (#151)

* Added back version testing, added versionName back to gradle file, added additional logic/route for receiving versioning values from build server, and fixed gradle task (previously inaccessible from gradle menu)

* Fixed ktlintKotlinScriptCheck error

* Forgot to fix variable name, swap active to previous implementation.

* Add comment for local testing

* Redundant toString call removed

* Revert continuousIntegration task logic (this did work before, I was just doing it wrong)

* Made bottom bar stateless and hoisted version / fingerprint to MainScreen (a revert to getting version name and fingerprint from MainViewModel)

* Update regex to include numbers
